import React, { Component } from "react"; import { Breadcrumb } from "@gull"; import { Tabs, Tab } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; class Checkout extends Component { state = {}; customTabHeader = (title, icon) => (
{title}
); render() { return (
Product Cart
Gull Modern Cart
Product Price Quantity Total Action
Nike Air Jordan
size-14 mode:664
$2,000 4 $8,000
Nike Air Jordan
size-14 mode:664
$2,000 4 $8,000
Nike Air Jordan
size-14 mode:664
$2,000 4 $8,000

Total Payment

Subtotal $5,000
Shipping
  • Change Address
Total: $5,015
Delivery Address
Billing Details
); } } export default Checkout;
